package.description: The robot_script package provides a Python based scripting language for the PR2, and eventuallay other robots. Scripts can move the robot limbs and head, and move the robot about. Emphasis is on basic, explicit operations; no autonomous behavior, or planning are provided. Scripts may interrogate the state of each joint. A fuzzy equality operator provides tolerance to small limb position inaccuracies. Scripts can wait for motion completion, or begin multiple motions that execute together. For advanced uses, event simulators can be plugged in, which generate scheduled events that may influence a scripts control flow.
package.author: Andreas Paepcke
